titles.title: A bill to provide for assistance for small manufacturers in the defense industrial supply chain on matters relating to cybersecurity.
A bill to provide for assistance for small manufacturers in the defense industrial supply chain on matters relating to cybersecurity.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the Department of Defense to award financial assistance to a Manufacturing Extension Center for the purpose of providing cybersecurity services to small manufacturers. The center must use such assistance for compliance with cybersecurity requirements and may use such assistance to employ trained personnel to deliver cybersecurity services to small manufacturers.
